krpano.action: mul(stagescale,get(vrtourdevicescale));
setControlMode(drag);
setControlMode(moveto);
txtadd(real_message_id, get(tour_language), "_", %2); set(%1, get(data[get(real_message_id)].content));
events.dispatch(onPanoStart);
set(events[ptp_audio_events].onTourStart, null); ptp_audio_start();
loadscene(%1, get(projection_current_params), NOPREVIEW|MERGE);
set(events[videointerface_start_events].onmousedown, null);
events.dispatch(videointerfaceready);
plugin[get(videointerface_video)].togglepause();
plugin[get(videointerface_video)].stop();
plugin[get(videointerface_video)].play();
plugin[get(videointerface_video)].pause();
plugin[get(videointerface_video)].seek(%1);

events.name: webvr_events
events.onkeydown: if(webvr AND webvr.isenabled AND keycode==32, webvr.resetSensor(0) );

krpano.action: webvr.saveSettings(); vr_setup_close(true);
set(layer[vr_setup_m1].visible,false); set(layer[vr_setup_m2].visible,true);
if(keycode==17,set(tour_ctrlPressed,true);,if(tour_ctrlPressed==true,if(keycode==96,hideTooltip();lookto(get(panoview.h),get(panoview.v),get(panoview.fov)););););
if(keycode==17,set(tour_ctrlPressed,false););
